title: Darius being disabled
body: How long is Darius going to disabled cause i really want to play him

replies.body: He'll be disabled until we have a fix that's been verified. We're working to resolve this ASAP!
Was this related to his bleed bug? Or something else entirely?
I believe the bug was that after casting certain abilities (I know his w was one of them) you wouldn't be able to auto attack afterwards.
you have a sad life dont you
Nope! Things have been going good! :D

Any chance of getting a hint as to whats wrong with Darius?

Or is he simply to tired from dunking all day?

Various glitches have been ignored but the last patch added an even more serious one; when E is used sometimes both players can't attack for 1-2 seconds, sometimes it's a 2 second stun on the enemy while you wail on the them. That's why Darius's win rate went up to 54%+ despite plebs playing him.
